signature.pp:
(X : Set ℝ) {x₀ : ℝ} (hx₀ : ClusterPt x₀ (.principal (X \ { x₀ }))) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hmono : Monotone f)
  (hderiv : DifferentiableWithinAt ℝ f X x₀) : derivWithin f X x₀ ≥ 0

(X : Set ℝ) {x₀ : ℝ} (hx₀ : ClusterPt x₀ (.principal (X \ { x₀ }))) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hmono : Antitone f)
  (hderiv : DifferentiableWithinAt ℝ f X x₀) : derivWithin f X x₀ ≤ 0

ref.pp:
theorem derivative_of_antitone (X : Set ℝ) {x₀ : ℝ} (hx₀ : ClusterPt x₀ (.principal (X \ { x₀ }))) {f : ℝ → ℝ}
    (hmono : Antitone f) (hderiv : DifferentiableWithinAt ℝ f X x₀) : derivWithin f X x₀ ≤ 0 := by sorry

signature.pp:
{a b : ℝ} (hab : a < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hderiv : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (.Icc a b))
  (hpos : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo a b, derivWithin f (.Icc a b) x > 0) : StrictMonoOn f (.Icc a b)

ref.pp:
/-- Proposition 10.3.3 / Exercise 10.3.4 -/
theorem strictMono_of_positive_derivative {a b : ℝ} (hab : a < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hderiv : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (.Icc a b))
    (hpos : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo a b, derivWithin f (.Icc a b) x > 0) : StrictMonoOn f (.Icc a b) := by sorry

signature.pp:
{a b : ℝ} (hab : a < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hderiv : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (.Icc a b))
  (hneg : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo a b, derivWithin f (.Icc a b) x < 0) : StrictAntiOn f (.Icc a b)

ref.pp:
theorem strictAnti_of_negative_derivative {a b : ℝ} (hab : a < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ} (hderiv : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (.Icc a b))
    (hneg : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo a b, derivWithin f (.Icc a b) x < 0) : StrictAntiOn f (.Icc a b) := by sorry

signature.pp: : ∃ f : ℝ → ℝ, Continuous f ∧ StrictMono f ∧ ¬DifferentiableAt ℝ f 0

ref.pp:
/-- Example 10.3.2 -/
example : ∃ f : ℝ → ℝ, Continuous f ∧ StrictMono f ∧ ¬DifferentiableAt ℝ f 0 := by sorry

signature.pp: : ∃ f : ℝ → ℝ, StrictMono f ∧ Differentiable ℝ f ∧ deriv f 0 = 0

ref.pp:
/-- Exercise 10.3.3 -/
example : ∃ f : ℝ → ℝ, StrictMono f ∧ Differentiable ℝ f ∧ deriv f 0 = 0 := by sorry

signature.pp: : ∃ (X : Set ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ), DifferentiableOn ℝ f X ∧ (∀ x ∈ X, derivWithin f X x > 0) ∧ ¬StrictMonoOn f X

ref.pp:
/-- Exercise 10.3.5 -/
example : ∃ (X : Set ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ), DifferentiableOn ℝ f X ∧ (∀ x ∈ X, derivWithin f X x > 0) ∧ ¬StrictMonoOn f X := by
  sorry
